DialogueText.Text: So... At last we meet. I've heard so much about you and your feats!  We've been watching you keenly since you bested the Dungeon's keeper, and now you've bested yet another soul-filled terror.

It seems that this world's stagnation nears its end, and we may very well have you to thank for that. Though I can't help but wonder, what is it that you truly aim to accomplish by upsetting the balance?
I believe our goals may align. I and my Order too wish to bring about change; we wish to usher in a new era of peace and prosperity, and our method to bring about such change will soon be ready.
We invite you to join us on our journey of change. There is much you could learn at our side, and with your help, I have no doubt a bright future awaits us all.
